DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis 3 Months Daily Supplementation RGC effect blood pressure vascular function . This single-center , double-blind , random , parallel control Study . Study population include 60 subject , divide randomly three group . The first group get RGC 200mg , second group get RGC 400mg , third group get 200mg placebo .

DOC.criteria: Age 3570 BMI < 40.0 kg/m2 Blood pressure : SYS . ≤154 mmHg , DIA . ≤93 mmHg . Breastfeeding pregnancy . Milk allergy substance may contain trace milk protein ( casein ) . Taking antihypertensive medication . Taking antioxidant food supplement , exclude probiotic agent fiber ( take less two week begin study ) . Subjects suffer follow condition : cardiovascular disorder , renal disorder , intestinal disorder , hepatic disease , malignant autoimmune diseases metabolic disease . A subject whose baseline blood test indicate abnormality hepatic renal function , thyroid function blood count . Unusual eating habit . The subject process active weight loss / gain . Addiction drug / alcohol . Medically documented psychiatric problem neurological disorder . Smokers . ( Subjects quit smoke two year ago may include study ) . Systolic blood pressure 154 mmHg . Diastolic blood pressure 93 mmHg . Taking phosphodiesterase 5 inhibitor treatment erectile dysfunction ( Viagra , Cialis , etc . ) .
